propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the children are in disabled state.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the children will indicate an error.
propDescriptions.required: If true, the user must specify a value for the input before the owning form can be submitted. If true, the asterisk appears on the FormLabel.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
